title: Vuelta a España ticker: UAE Team Emirates backs two-leader strategy in podium push, Evenepoel brings ‘a lot of confidence and motivation’, Mas returns for Movistar
content:
Follow all the pre-race news ahead of the opening Barcelona team time trial on Saturday 26.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España ticker: UAE Team Emirates backs two-leader strategy in podium push, Evenepoel brings ‘a lot of confidence and motivation’, Mas returns for Movistar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
